mapper.select: select Cart_id, user_id, c.food_code as food_code, quantity, added_at, fi.food_name as foodName, trunc(fi.price*((100-fi.discount_Percent)/100), -2) as discountPrice, fi.DISCOUNT_PERCENT discountPercent, fi.img_src as imgSrc from cart c join food_item fi on c.food_code = fi.food_code where user_id = #{a}

select Cart_id, user_id, c.food_code as food_code, quantity, added_at, fi.food_name as foodName, fi.price as price, trunc(fi.price*((100-fi.discount_Percent)/100), -2) as discountPrice, fi.DISCOUNT_PERCENT discountPercent, fi.img_src as imgSrc from cart c join food_item fi on c.food_code = fi.food_code where cart_id = #{a}

select DELIVERY_ID as deliveryId, user_id as userId, DELIVERY_STATUS as deliveryStatus, ORDER_DATE orderDate, RECIPIENT_NAME recipientName, TOTAL_PRICE totalPrice, INVOICE_NUMBER invoiceNumber from delivery
ORDER_DATE between to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and DELIVERY_STATUS = #{status}
